name: Kumano Kodo_ Koguchi - Kumano Nachi Taisha
description: Check out this 16.1-km point-to-point trail near Tatsuno, Wakayama. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 6 h 42 min to complete. This is a very popular area for hiking and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are January through January.
